title: I got the email and signed up but the download is not found?
body: I just recently got in the mobile testing and got to the link and everything but I can't get download the actual app. Can I get some help please?

replies.body:
Hmm well the email I got it sent to was not gmail therefore I cannot open with same email account...well bummer guess I don't get to test it after all :(

Edit: Weird I just tried one more time and for some reason it worked. I guess just wait a bit and try again? Not sure why it decided to work randomly haha
Glad it worked!  We think it's something with the Play store.  We've been stumped on this one D:
This is a reply: I have recently go the app to work, I tried to relog and waited. Then it worked so I might leave this thread open to help others.    [May the{{champion:238}}  be with you!]
I am having problems logging in. Downloaded the app after receiving the email. Logged in and it says i am not a beta user so i cant access anything. Signs me right out. Any suggestions?

> [{quoted}](name=PinappleRises,realm=NA,application-id=J7eFAjsN,discussion-id=zXyin4A9,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-02-11T01:40:31.108+0000)
>
> I am having problems logging in. Downloaded the app after receiving the email. Logged in and it says i am not a beta user so i cant access anything. Signs me right out. Any suggestions?

Heya Pineapple! I just double checked your summoner name and there may have been a small snafu on our end. :)  Please try signing out and back in and let me know if that fixes it? You should be good to go now!

I'm having some of the same issues as well except for it won't work on my PC OR my phone. I'm assuming it's just an issue with the Play Store so I'll wait a few hours/days and check back. Also, it's not found in the Play Store itself, and if it is, it's extremely hard to locate.

I'm having the same problem. Received the beta invite, and I'm attempting to download the app, but when I go to the link it errors out. I cannot find the app in the play store itself. I see that it appears to have resolved itself after a few days. I'll try again from my home computer when I'm back from work, and keep you updated. Excited to try the app!
Yeah, it magically worked after a few days. But thanks for the advice anyway guys. <3
We had that happen randomly too with the Google Play link on the final step. We found that sometimes opening the link on the phone, and then on our computer (or vice versa) worked.
I did the opposite where I opened the link on my computer (which failed to work) then I opened it on my phone and the download worked all of a sudden. Couldn't find it on the play store initially.
I had the same problem, but now I got it. Make sure you're using the same email account you got the email from on your Google play store.
